content.question: In line 1, coniunx mea non potes esse is translated

choices.label: my wife is not able to be present
you will not be my unwilling wife
you are not able to be my wife

content.answer: you are not able to be my wife

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
